pregunta: Hello, Jack. How are you?\n_____ Sophie! I’m great, thanks.

b: where can I find the bus station
d: where can be found the bus station

pregunta: (end of pre-intermediate)\nThere are a lot of things to do in this house! Mark, you ____ the laundry and… Mary, you _____ breakfast while I ____ the ironing.

pregunta: Million of books__________ everyday.
